<<<<<<< HEAD
A vvedding sermon preached at Bentley in Darby-shire vpon Michaelmasse day last past anno Domini. 1607. Wherein is set forth the bond and preseruation. ... By R. Abbot ... Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.
[6], 67, [7] p.
By N. O[kes] for Roger Iackson dwelling in Fleetstreet neere to the great conduit, Printed at London : 1608.
At the wedding of Sir John Stanhope and Olive Berrisford. Printer's name from STC. The three final leaves are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

By N. O[kes] for Roger Iackson dwelling in Fleetstreet neere to the great conduit, Printed at London : 1608.
At the wedding of Sir John Stanhope and Olive Berrisford. Printer's name from STC. The three final leaves are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
